attributes.action: Scrap the postion of Mayor Of London as we didn't ask for one....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The position of Mayor Of London has been created at much cost and the motorist seems to be paying the price!
There is no choice of electing a new candidate so I suggest we scrap this position and either replace with regularly elected candidates or indeed save the cost of the mayor, offices and staff and use towards the road costs instead. How many congestion charges does it take to cover his wages alone.
N.B.This is not a vendetta against Ken Livingstone as a person. But even the government are elected every 4 years.... and there was no referendum as to whether the people actually wanted a Mayor Of London in the first place.
